name: Chole (Vegetarian Indian Chickpeas)
author: Van Dana
summary: A popular vegetarian Indian dish made of chickpeas and spices. Serve with white rice or naan.
ingredients: 2  star anise pods, broken into pieces
1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1  whole clove, or more to taste
directions: Heat oil in a pot over medium-high heat
Saute onion until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add garlic, ginger, and anise; stir
Add chickpeas, tomato sauce, water, chile powder, garam masala, salt, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and clove
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, until chickpeas start to soften, 5 to 7 minutes
Mash some of the chickpeas directly in the pot to give the sauce a chunkier consistency
Cover and continue simmering, stirring occasionally, until flavors come together, about 15 minutes
Remove star anise pieces and clove before serving
